name: Firefox New Tab about:newtab ( Hide Search Bar )
description: You won't see anymore the Search Bar in the New Tab page that came up in Firefox 31. If you like this please comment and give me some feedback, it would be a great motivation! Thanks. [ I'm looking for someone that wants to help me in ripping the New Tab page. and make it possible to add pages to it. If you want to collaborate with me please contact me, thanks! ]
